hero.sub: We don't just deploy technology. We partner with you to architect the next era of your business.

about.title: WE ARE
about.desc: Experts of Service Systems and Application, AI-based.

products.name: Innilabs Workflow Controller (WORKRAFT)
products.desc: A MSA component within your IT system that orchestrates and manages the flow of tasks and processes in a predefined sequence. It ensures that tasks are executed in the correct order and handles exceptions or deviations from the expected workflow.

products.name: Innilabs Unified Messaging System (ILUMS)
products.desc: A comprehensive "Unified Messaging Solution" that can integrate and manage various messaging channels in coordination with administration, public institutions, and corporate CRM systems.

products.name: Service Application for Innilabs OCR (SAILOC)
products.desc: SAILOC is an advanced Optical Character Recognition (OCR) service application designed to seamlessly extract, analyze, and process text from images, scanned documents, and handwritten notes. Built with cutting-edge AI and machine learning algorithms to deliver unparalleled accuracy, speed, and versatility.

products.name: Innilabs API Gateway (API-SSAC)
products.desc: A powerful MSA component for API Management, which involves organizing, securing, and analyzing your APIs. It helps businesses control how their APIs are accessed and used, ensuring security, performance, and developer satisfaction.

products.name: Innilabs Deployment By Approval (ILDEBYA)
products.desc: A component as DevOps lifecycle tool, that allows your team to set up approval workflows for changes made to code repositories. This system enables teams to enforce review and approval processes before changes are merged into the codebase, ensuring quality control, compliance, and collaboration among team members.

products.name: Artificial Intelligence Framework Objects (AIFO)
products.desc: These ready-to-use components streamline the creation of AI-driven applications, enabling developers and organizations to focus on innovation rather than reinventing the wheel. We provides the building blocks you need to develop, deploy, and scale cutting-edge AI solutions efficiently.

solutions.title: WHAT YOU CAN TRY WITH US

options.title: Custom-Built Service System
options.desc: Design and launch an AI-native System of Service tailored to your workflows, compliance needs, and growth targets.

options.title: Existing System Enhancement
options.desc: Supercharge your current stack with AI, automation, and orchestration—no rip-and-replace.

options.title: SHARE YOUR BUSINESS IDEA WITH US
options.desc: Bring your concept or pain point—we'll co-ideate, validate with rapid prototypes, and map ROI.

hero.sub: Tidak hanya menerapkan teknologi. Kami adalah Partner untuk era baru bisnis Anda.

about.title: KAMI
about.desc: Expert di bidang Service System dan Aplikasi berbasis AI

products.name: Innilabs Workflow Controller (WORKRAFT)
products.desc: Komponen MSA dalam sistem IT Anda untuk mengatur dan mengelola flow tugas dan proses dalam urutan yang telah ditentukan sebelumnya. Komponen ini memastikan tugas dieksekusi dalam urutan yang benar dan menangani pengecualian atau penyimpangan dari alur kerja yang diharapkan.

products.name: Innilabs Unified Messaging System (ILUMS)
products.desc: "Unified Messaging Solution" yang komprehensif dan dapat mengintegrasikan dan mengelola berbagai saluran pesan dalam koordinasi dengan administrasi, lembaga publik, dan sistem CRM perusahaan.

products.name: Service Application for Innilabs OCR (SAILOC)
products.desc: SAILOC adalah aplikasi layanan Optical Character Recognition (OCR) canggih yang dirancang untuk mengekstrak, menganalisis, dan memproses teks dari gambar, dokumen pindaian, dan catatan tulisan tangan dengan mudah. ​​Dibangun dengan AI dan algoritma machine learning mutakhir untuk menghadirkan akurasi, kecepatan, dan fleksibilitas.

products.name: Innilabs API Gateway (API-SSAC)
products.desc: Komponen MSA yang andal untuk Manajemen API, yang mencakup pengorganisasian, pengamanan, dan analisis API Anda. Komponen ini membantu bisnis mengontrol cara API mereka diakses dan digunakan, memastikan keamanan, performa, dan kepuasan dalam pengembangan sistem.

products.name: Innilabs Deployment By Approval (ILDEBYA)
products.desc: Komponen life cycle untuk DevOps yang memungkinkan tim Anda menyiapkan approval workflow untuk perubahan yang dibuat pada repositori kode. Sistem ini memungkinkan tim untuk menerapkan proses peninjauan dan persetujuan sebelum perubahan digabungkan ke dalam code base, memastikan quality control, compliance (kepatuhan), dan kolaborasi antar anggota tim.

products.name: Artificial Intelligence Framework Objects (AIFO)
products.desc: Komponen siap pakai ini menyederhanakan pembuatan aplikasi berbasis AI, memungkinkan developer dan organisasi untuk berfokus pada inovasi tanpa reenventing the wheel (membuat kembali). Kami menyediakan fondasi yang Anda butuhkan untuk mengembangkan, menerapkan, dan meningkatkan skala solusi AI mutakhir secara efisien.

options.title: Custom-Built Service System
options.desc: Rancang dan luncurkan Service System berbasis AI yang disesuaikan dengan workflow, kebutuhan copliance, dan growth target Anda.

options.title: Existing System Enhancement
options.desc: Tingkatkan stack Anda saat ini dengan AI, automation, dan orchestration—no rip-and-replace.

options.title: KEMBANGKAN IDE BISNIS ANDA BERSAMA KAMI
options.desc: Bagikan konsep atau pain point Anda—kami akan kembangkan ide-ide Anda, validasi dengan rapid prototypes, dan petakan ROI-nya.

hero.sub: 고객과 함께 새로운 비즈니스 시대를 열어가는 기술을 제시합니다.

about.title: 우리는
about.desc: 서비스 시스템과 다양한 소프트웨어 분야의 전문가입니다. AI도 물론 포함해서요.

products.name: Innilabs Workflow Controller (WORKRAFT)
products.desc: IT 시스템 내에서 작업과 프로세스 흐름을 미리 정의된 순서에 따라 조율하고 관리하는 MSA 구성 요소입니다. 작업이 올바른 순서로 실행되도록 보장하며, 예외나 비정상적인 상황을 자동으로 처리합니다.

products.name: Innilabs Unified Messaging System (ILUMS)
products.desc: 행정기관, 공공기관, 기업 CRM 시스템과 연계해 다양한 메시징 채널을 통합 관리할 수 있는 종합 “통합 메시징 솔루션”입니다.

products.name: Service Application for Innilabs OCR (SAILOC)
products.desc: 이미지, 스캔 문서, 손글씨 등에서 텍스트를 정확하게 추출하고 분석하는 고성능 OCR 서비스 애플리케이션입니다. 최신 AI 및 머신러닝 기술을 기반으로 뛰어난 정확도와 속도를 제공합니다.

products.name: Innilabs API Gateway (API-SSAC)
products.desc: API의 구성, 보안, 분석을 관리하는 강력한 MSA 기반 API 관리 구성 요소입니다. 기업이 API 접근과 사용 방식을 통제하여 보안, 성능, 개발자 경험을 향상시킬 수 있도록 지원합니다.

products.name: Innilabs Deployment By Approval (ILDEBYA)
products.desc: 코드 변경사항에 대한 승인 워크플로를 설정할 수 있는 DevOps 라이프사이클 구성 요소입니다. 코드 병합 전 검토 및 승인 절차를 통해 품질 관리, 규정 준수, 협업 효율성을 강화합니다.

products.name: Artificial Intelligence Framework Objects (AIFO)
products.desc: 즉시 사용할 수 있는 AI 프레임워크 구성 요소로, 개발자가 복잡한 구현 없이 혁신에 집중할 수 있도록 돕습니다. 효율적으로 AI 솔루션을 개발·배포·확장할 수 있는 기반을 제공합니다.

solutions.title: 함께 시도해 볼 수 있는 좋은 방법

options.title: 맞춤형 서비스 시스템
options.desc: 귀사의 워크플로, 규제 요건, 성장 목표에 맞춘 AI 기반 서비스 시스템을 설계하고 구현할 수 있어요.

options.title: 보유 시스템 고도화
options.desc: 기존 인프라를 그대로 유지하면서 AI, 자동화, 오케스트레이션을 통해 시스템 성능을 강화할 수 있어요.

options.title: 비즈니스 아이디어 공유 및 실현
options.desc: 귀하의 아이디어나 고민을 들려주세요. 함께 아이디어를 발전시키고, 빠른 프로토타입으로 검증하며, ROI를 명확히 도출해드립니다.
